name: carnival-chatbot
description: A chatbot for McGill's winter Carnival

scripts.dev: env CCBOT_DB='ccdb-dev' env CCBOT_HOST='159.203.32.219' env CCBOT_USER='ccbot69' env CCBOT_PWD='devpass' env CCBOT_PORT='6969' nodemon src/server.ts --watch 'src/**/*.ts'  --exec 'ts-node'
scripts.stage: env CCBOT_DB='ccdb-dev' env CCBOT_HOST='159.203.32.219' env CCBOT_USER='ccbot69' env CCBOT_PWD='devpass' env CCBOT_PORT='6969' node src/server.js
scripts.prod-test: env CCBOT_DB='ccdb-dev' env CCBOT_HOST='localhost' env CCBOT_USER='ccbot69' env CCBOT_PWD='devpass' env CCBOT_PORT='80' node src/server.js
scripts.dev-local: mongod | env CCBOT_DB='ccdb-dev' env CCBOT_HOST='localhost' env CCBOT_PORT='6969' nodemon src/server.ts --watch 'src/**/*.ts'  --exec 'ts-node'
scripts.test: mongod | env CCBOT_DB='ccdb-test' env CCBOT_USER='ccbot69' env CCBOT_PWD='testpass' env CCBOT_PORT='6868' mocha -w test/testrunner.ts
scripts.test-cover: mongod | env CCBOT_DB='ccdb-test' env CCBOT_USER='ccbot69' env CCBOT_PWD='testpass' env CCBOT_PORT='6868' istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha

author: Francis O'Brien
